typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SOURCE_CODE_KEY as string,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		TARGET_CODE as string,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CODE_TYPE as string,
		CODE_TYPE_ID as double,
		CODE2 as string,
		OM_X_REF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> TCrossreference
TCrossreference filter(CODE_TYPE_ID == 802) ~> FilterCodeTypeID
Aggregate1 derive(date_inserted = currentTimestamp(),
		date_last_updated = currentTimestamp(),
		inserted_by = 'M_PRE_DIM_PREMIUM_TYPE',
		last_updated_by = 'M_PRE_DIM_PREMIUM_TYPE',
		source_system = 'MAPPINGSYSTEM',
		source_column = 'TARGET_CODE') ~> Constant
FilterCodeTypeID aggregate(groupBy(TARGET_CODE),
	TARGET_DESCRIPTION = first(TARGET_DESCRIPTION)) ~> Aggregate1
Constant select(mapColumn(
		pk_key_pty = TARGET_CODE,
		pty_code = TARGET_CODE,
		pty_description = TARGET_DESCRIPTION,
		date_inserted,
		date_last_updated,
		inserted_by,
		last_updated_by,
		pty_source_system = source_system,
		pty_source_column = source_column
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(input(
		PK_KEY as string,
		CPT_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CPT_NUMBER as integer,
		INSERTED_BY as string,
		DATE_INSERTED as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink_m_pre_dim_premium_type
